墊.definition: pad; cushion; mat; to pad out; to fill a gap; to pay for sb; to advance (money)

墊付.definition: to pay sb else's expense with the expectation of being reimbursed by that person later

墊底.definition: to put sth on the bottom; to eat sth to tide oneself over until mealtime; to lay the foundation; to come last in the rankings

墊底兒.definition: erhua variant of 墊底|垫底[dian4 di3]

墊底費.definition: deductible (the part of an insurance claim paid by the insured); (UK English) excess

墊檔.definition: to fill a blank space; to fill a slot (in a newspaper column, a TV program etc)

墊江.definition: Dianjiang, a county in Chongqing 重慶|重庆[Chong2qing4]

墊江縣.definition: Dianjiang, a county in Chongqing 重慶|重庆[Chong2qing4]

墊背.definition: to serve as a sacrificial victim; to suffer for sb else; scapegoat; to share sb's fate

墊腳石.definition: stepping stone; fig. person used to advance one's career

墊補.definition: (coll.) to cover a shortfall by using funds intended for another purpose or by borrowing some money; (coll.) to snack

墊高.definition: a support; to raise; to bolster; to jack up
